means: 不必要地，多余地，不需要地

sentence.Network_en: The proposed regulations are ill-defined and cumbersome and could be unnecessarily costly.
sentence.Network_cn: 提议的规章制度阐述不清、复杂低效，而且可能会带来不必要的过高花费。

sentence.Network_en: I didn't want to upset my husband or my daughter unnecessarily.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不想让我的丈夫和女儿不必要地担忧。

sentence.Network_en: The silence lengthened as Thorne unnecessarily shuffled some papers.
sentence.Network_cn: 索恩整理着一些本无须整理的文件，沉默还在延续。

list.abs: They shall not be unnecessarily complicated or costly , or entail unreasonable time - limits or unwarranted delays ., 它们不得过于复杂或花费过高 , 或包含不合理的时效或无保障的拖延.

To touch hands and feet unnecessarily ., 多手多脚.

entry.tran: 不需要的；没必要的；多余的
entry.def: If you describe something as unnecessary, you mean that it is not needed or does not have to be done, and is undesirable.

example.ex: The slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman...
example.tran: 屠杀鲸鱼是没有必要的也是不人道的。

example.ex: He accused Diana of making an unnecessary fuss.
example.tran: 他责备黛安娜没必要那么大惊小怪。

auth_sentence.content: Much habitat area is unnecessarily taken away from wildlife.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much habitat area is unnecessarily taken away from wildlife.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much habitat area is unnecessarily taken away from wildlife.

auth_sentence.content: The cost of contract support has been unnecessarily high.
auth_sentence.res_content: The cost of contract support has been unnecessarily high.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cost of contract support has been unnecessarily high.

auth_sentence.content: They say too many people are dying unnecessarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: They say too many people are dying unnecessarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They say too many people are dying unnecessarily.

Sentence.sentence: She insists that it's exposing workers to unnecessarily high doses of radiation.

means.word_mean: 不必要地;多余地;不需要地

sentences.en: I don’t want to invade your private life unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 我不想过多地干涉你的私生活。

sentences.en: The decision by the headmaster was called in doubt by some of the teachers who thought it unnecessarily harsh.
sentences.cn: 有些教师对校长的决定存有异议,他们认为没有必要那么严厉。

sentences.en: Some parents worry unnecessarily about their children.
sentences.cn: 有些父母不必要地为孩子担心。

sentences.en: The report paints an unnecessarily bleak picture of the town.
sentences.cn: 这份报道把这个镇子描绘得过于惨淡。
